app.title: Resume Builder
app.subtitle: Create your professional resume in minutes
app.privacy: üîí Your privacy is protected. All data is processed locally and never stored on our servers.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Let's start with your basic contact information.

placeholders.jobTitle: e.g., Software Engineer, Marketing Specialist, Recent Graduate

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.subtitle: Your "elevator pitch" - convince employers to keep reading. You can use formatting like bold, italics, and bullet points.
summary.placeholder: Summarize your professional background, core skills, and career objectives. You can use bold, italic, and bullet points.
summary.tip: Use formatting to highlight key achievements. Numbers and metrics make your summary more compelling.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: The heart of your resume. Focus on achievements rather than just responsibilities.
experience.tip: Start with action verbs and use **bold** to highlight key metrics and achievements.

placeholders.responsibilities: Use bullet points starting with action verbs. Quantify your achievements when possible.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Add your educational background - from degrees to certificates and courses.

placeholders.courseOrQualification: e.g., Bachelor of Computer Science, Data Analytics Certificate, High School Diploma
placeholders.institution: e.g., Stanford University, Google Career Certificates, Central High School
placeholders.highlights: Key projects, achievements, relevant coursework, or skills gained...

tips.general: Keep it simple - just add the course/qualification name and institution.
tips.simplified: This format works for all education levels: degrees, certificates, diplomas, and courses.
tips.highlights: Use highlights to mention relevant projects, achievements, or skills you gained.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: List your core skills and rate your proficiency level.
skills.noSkillsHint: Add your first skill using the input field above
skills.addTip: Press Enter or comma to add each skill. Include both technical and soft skills.
skills.placeholder: Type a skill (e.g., Python, Photoshop, Fluent English) and press Enter or comma

optional.title: Optional Sections
optional.subtitle: Add additional information to make your resume stand out. All sections are optional.
optional.hobbiesTip: Separate multiple hobbies with commas. Keep it professional and relevant when possible.

placeholders.hobbies: e.g., Photography, Hiking, Playing Guitar, Reading, Volunteer Work

preview.title: Resume Preview
preview.subtitle: Review your resume and download when ready.

documentInfo.title: Professional Resume Preview:
documentInfo.content: This preview matches the DOCX format exactly.
documentInfo.details: The design uses professional Word document styling with Times New Roman font, proper spacing, and standard business formatting.

mobileNotice.title: Mobile Users (iPhone/iPad):
mobileNotice.subtitle: If the Word download doesn't work, try:

options.option1: Use the View option instead of Download, then forward to your computer
options.option2: Use the "Download Text" option as an alternative
options.option3: Open this page on a desktop/laptop computer
options.option4: Email yourself the link to access on a computer

privacyNotice.title: Privacy Protected:
privacyNotice.content: All your data is processed locally and never stored on our servers.
privacyNotice.reminder: Please save your generated document safely.
